content: we don't support #[path] attributes yet, right? I'm trying to understand why f32 and f64 autocompletion doesn't work and this may explain it: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/libcore/lib.rs#L163
but it shouldn't be too hard to add
as in, it does require a fair amount of plumbing, but all the relevant bits are in place
